title: Economic predictions, courtesy of the stock market
itunes:title: Economic predictions, courtesy of the stock market
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: It’s been a rough year for the stock market. But the stock market doesn’t always provide a clear roadmap of where the economy is headed. Today, the factors behind stock market volatility and how much we can read into the ups and downs. Also in the program: Europe turns to coal to avoid an energy crisis and a look at natural disaster modeling following Hurricane Ian.
